content: Hey @Kevin Power , re:FHIR-13834, I'm not sure I understand the proposed resolution. If the original description was asking about "Mapping from V2 field 'Allelic read depth'", couldn't we say that "read depth" is part of the Variant profile on Observation?
Good point @Liz Amos - My apologies, I will update the resolution (once JIRA is available, I can't seem to sign-in right now)
